CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, January 17, 1959, pg. 1, reads: "Weeps Over 'Buddy' - George Godfrey, left, could not hide his emotions or tears as he left Wesley Center AME Zion Church last Tuesday, where burial rites were held for his mother, 'Ma Pitts.' in center, behind George, is Philip Godfrey, 'Big Jack' Godfrey's son, and to the right is Ollie Godfrey, 'Big Jack's' wife. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: George Godfrey wearing light colored overcoat and holding handkerchief, walking down steps of Wesley Center AME Zion Church, with his son Philip Godfrey, and his wife Ollie Godfrey, for funeral of his mother Erin "Ma Pitts" Godfrey
